definition: to slip out of sth/to hide sth in one's sleeve
to take off (clothes)/to shed feathers/(of color) to fade/to discolor
the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to take off (trousers)/to drop one's pants
to take off (one's clothes)/(fig.) to shed (one's former image etc)/(of a fad or the after-effects of a disaster etc) to subside/also pr. [tun4 qu4]
(coll.) to break loose/to shake off responsibility

sentences.english: The avocado shows a typical loss of green color and a reduction in vegetative growth.
sentences.chinese: 鱷梨呈現典型的葉色褪綠及營養生長減弱。

sentences.english: But its impact on Chinese science and technology should not diminish.
sentences.chinese: 但求是科技基金會在中國科技界的影響力絕不減褪。

sentences.english: Disappeared at sunrise, seemed only a fairytale.
sentences.chinese: 在日出前消褪，像一則童話般唯美。

sentences.english: Fading home-made kites are propped in tangles of string against the balustrade.
sentences.chinese: 褪了色的自制風箏在矮牆上纏成一團。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the preparing technique of melatonin starch microspheres for intranasal administration.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究褪黑激素鼻黏膜給藥澱粉微球的製備工藝。

sentences.english: The depression generally lifts during spring and summer.
sentences.chinese: 抑鬱通常在春季和夏季消褪。

sentences.english: The melatonin concentration in flowers and seeds was also observed.
sentences.chinese: 在花和種子中也檢測到褪黑激素。

sentences.english: It's a great natural source of melatonin, the sleep hormone, as well as tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉富含褪黑激素，和色氨酸一樣，也能促進睡眠。

sentences.english: In the youth long other bends down in this clamors silent, has shed palely lively .
sentences.chinese: 青春在此長彼伏的喧譁裏寂靜，淡褪了繁華。

sentences.english: Twickenham - the home stadium of the national team of England in Twickenham, England.
sentences.chinese: 褪可漢姆球場，英格蘭國家隊的主場，坐落於倫敦。
染印時顏色被固定住，不易再褪。

sentences.english: She uses some grease to take the jade bracelet off her wrist.
sentences.chinese: 她抹了些潤滑油把玉鐲從手腕上褪了下來。

sentences.english: The tradesman traded his faded denims for the tradesman's jade necklace.
sentences.chinese: 店主用他那褪了色的牛仔褲換來了送貨員的翡翠項鍊。
初次見面臉紅的感覺消褪了麼？

sentences.english: The chlorotic areas become necrotic. The issue dies and leaves dry up .
sentences.chinese: 褪綠區壞死，組織死亡，葉片乾枯。
